about_the_game:
The game is a direct continuation of the storyline from the previous part of the Lust series – Lust from Beyond.

When the organizational structures of the ecstasy cult heirs reform, they summon the God of Pleasure lauv'abrarc. As the divine entity sets its feet unto Earth, terror-stricken nonbelievers initiate a nuclear onslaught that tears the giant’s body apart.

And thus, mankind killed a God.



A STORY OF DESIRE



The closed zone which contains the remnants of the God is deemed contaminated and deadly as it is filled with otherworldly anomalies and mutations – due to that, people decided to surround it with strict military surveillance. Nevertheless, members of the Cult of Ecstasy adapt to the new reality, searching for knowledge whilst keeping their faith close to their hearts and preach the word to the rest of the world, gaining acknowledgment both inside and outside of the military-controlled zone.

lauv'abrarc’s awakening brought uncertainty into humanity’s core beliefs. With time, it came to light, that a cult equipped with deep knowledge about that divine entity has always been lurking in the shadows. The Cult of Ecstasy slowly started to gain power and unlimited resources.



FRESH BLOOD



Guided by a newfound faith, the heroine ventures straight to the cult's headquarters, located in a zone permeated by the remnants of the god of pleasure. There, she undergoes a transhumanism trial, merging the tissues of the god with her flesh.

In her escape, the heroine grapples with the mutation of her own body, witnessing and experiencing more than any "ordinary" human. She hears the voice of the god lauv’abrarc resonating in her heart, leading her directly to his dead body.

The heroine begins to perceive her significant role in this sacred mission.



KEY FEATURES



- Bold erotic themes in a horror setting
- Confront terrifying enemies and make executions on them
- Solve logical puzzles
- Elaborate ASMR system, "voices of ecstasy" in the main character’s head
- Experience the heroine’s deep personal story infused with horror
- Soak up the disturbing atmosphere of psychosis blending with surrealism
- A world inspired by the works of Lovecraft, Giger, and Beksiński.

content_descriptors.notes: Lust of God contains sex and nudity, extreme and sexual violence and it's not suitable for viewers under 18

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.
